Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data:
<report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' queryClass='Custom.AUSW.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.OperationsRegister' queryName='OperationsRegister' name='OperationsRegister'> <parameter expression='..DateFrom'/> <parameter expression='..DateTo'/> <parameter expression='..Facility'/> <parameter expression='..TheatreDept'/> <parameter expression='..Theatre'/> <attribute name='ReportTitle' expression='$$$Text("@OperationsRegister@Operations Register")'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/> <attribute name='facility' expression="..GetHospListDesc(..Facility)"/> <attribute name="datefrom" expression="..DisplayDate(..DateFrom)"/> <attribute name="dateto" expression="..DisplayDate(..DateTo)"/> <attribute name='otarea' expression="..GetSpecialtyListDesc(..TheatreDept)"/> <attribute name='theatre' expression="..GetRBEquipmentListDesc(..Theatre)"/>
<group name="facility" breakOnField="HOSPDesc"> <attribute name="description" field="HOSPDesc" /> <aggregate name='TotalOperations' type='CUSTOM' field='ANAOPRowID' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/> <group name="TheatreDept" breakOnField="TheatreDeptDesc"> <attribute name="description" field="TheatreDeptDesc" /> <aggregate name='TotalOperations' type='CUSTOM' field='ANAOPRowID' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/> <group name="Theatre" breakOnField="TheatreDesc"> <attribute name="description" field="TheatreDesc" /> <aggregate name='TotalOperations' type='CUSTOM' field='ANAOPRowID' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/> <group name="Date" breakOnField="ANAOPOpStartDate"> <attribute name="description" field="ANAOPOpStartDate" expression="$ZD($ZDATEH(%val,5),2)"/> <aggregate name='TotalOperations' type='CUSTOM' field='ANAOPRowID' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/> <group name='Detail'> <element field='PAPMINo' name='PAPMINo'/> <element fields='PAPERName,PAPERName2,PAPERName3' name='PatientName' expression='..DisplayName(%val("PAPERName"),%val("PAPERName2"),%val("PAPERName3"))'/> <element field='SPPPDesc' name='ANAOPProcedure' escape="none"/> <element field='ANTYPEDesc' name='ANTYPEDesc'/> <element field='ANASTARTTime' name='ANASTARTTime'/> <element field='ANAFINISHTime' name='ANAFINISHTime'/> <element field='FullSurgeonName' name='FullSurgeonName'/> <element field='AssistingSurgeon' name='AssistingSurgeon' escape="none"/> <element field='FullAnaesName' name='FullAnaesName'/> </group> </group> </group> </group> </group> </report>

XData.name: ReportDisplay
